metadata.title: Thursday, 1st November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection when the Government will demarcate the boundary between Zambia and Angola in Shangombo District especially that the Angolan Government claims the Kuando River is entirely on their territory.
Minister of Information and Broadcasting when the Zambia National Broadcasting Corporation radio and television signals will be extended to Mulobezi District.
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development how many boreholes will be sunk in Mangango Parliamentary Constituency in 2012, ward by ward.
Vice President what progress has been made in the fight against corruption from September, 2011 to August, 2012.

parts: (a)    what measures the Government has taken to stop piracy of music in Zambia; and

(b)    whether the Government has any plans to assist the Zambian artists with resources to enable them compete favourably against other musicians in Africa. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (12th October) - Resumption of Debate; - (The Deputy Minister for Western Province).
